title: Zombieland is reanimated and the merits of a Tetris movie - plus all today's pop culture | Culture | The Guardian
summary: warning : new u2 album nearly ready , method of deliverance as yet unidentified .
get freaky with the new american horror story trailer .
`` we 're not giving feet to the geometric shapes , '' the tetris movie is coming to a cinema near you .

documents.title: resurrected zombieland news
text: zombieland tv series : hated out of existence those following the blog closely might be thinking : huh , where is my zombieland news ? ''
well , the news is that the sequel is happening .

it 's not clear who is going to be onboard yet but it 's not likely to anything like the tv pilot which was panned by fans , prompting this comment from writer/producer rhett reese : sad for everyone involved .
i 'll never understand the vehement hate the pilot received from die-hard zombieland fans .
you guys successfully hated it out of existence .
anyway , we did our best , and we 're very proud of our team . ''

documents.title: warning : new u2 album nearly ready , method of deliverance as yet unidentified
text: with quite frankly frightening speed , u2 have announced that they have finished 70 % '' of their next album .

the rhythm , the rebel : u2 with apple ceo tim cook jose sanchez/ap of the release of the follow up to songs of innocence - entitled songs of experience ( very clever guys , but i think blake might have got there first by about 200 years ) - bassist adam clayton told q magazine that there may be a whole new delivery method invented by then '' , so we can only imagine the means by which a future u2 album may enter into all our lives .

despite metallica 's lars ulrich recently heralding u2 's itunes heist as an attempt to reinvent the wheel '' , clayton is slightly more modest , comparing his band 's antics to those of short-lived money-burners the klf .

it 's very dangerous and i like the balls of it '' , said clayton , who seems to have confused bravery and anarchy with having the obscene power and influence that enables you to legitimately infiltrate 500 million people 's itunes accounts as part of the biggest brand deal in music history

documents.title: cassetteboy vs conservative party conference
text: yesterday cassetteboy wrote an article for the guardian in which they outlined how new legislation means they can no longer be prosecuted for their copyright-defying mash-ups .
and today , as a big thank you to dave and his crew , they 've remixed cameron 's conference speeches into a brand new modus operandi for the tories .
enjoy .
lose yourself in cameron 's frankest conference speech to date

documents.title: get freaky with the new american horror story trailer
text: last night buzzfeed premiered the first proper trailer for the new series of american horror story , which begins on fx on october 8th in the us , and gets shown over here on the 21st on fox .

freak in the morning/freak in the evening american horror story : freak show will feature the programme 's recurring cast in an all new and disturbing setting , with sarah paulson playing conjoined twins dot and bette tattler , newly arrived at one of the us 's last remaining freak shows in florida in the 1950s .

judging from the trailer , this season of ahs is going to be another compelling carnival of horror - but the real question is can it live up to its own hype - what with having already produced one of the grimmest promo posters in all of history theresa may 's new look sorry if you never look at the human form in quite the same way again .

documents.title: munchtime links
text: jeffrey tambor explains being transgender to stephen colbert watch chromeo channel roadhouse and narrowly avoid a beating from napoleon dynamite weezer album ranking controversy weezer image stereogum have had a go at ranking weezer 's albums from best to worst and starts with this li ( n ) e : put this in your hash pipe and smoke it : weezer does n't have a bad album . ''
one word : raditude .

take a look inside the record bag of berlin-based techno bod call super the new wu tang album comes in a portable speaker wu tang have teamed up with boombotix to present their a better tomorrow in a portable speaker .
yeah , not a strictly limited multi-million pound cask or even an over-priced smartphone - their album is hidden in a speaker .
speakers ' corner wolff - patrick/redferns via getty images
iceage : country-core ?
matador danish hardcore quartet iceage have thrown a bit of a curveball with their new country influenced album , plowing into the field of love .
people let out a collective huh ? ''

when they put out the video for the lord 's favourite in july , with vice running it under a headline that read : iceage discovered acoustic guitars for the lord 's favorite '' and everyone is pissed , '' which is about right .
our very own david stubbs is n't too jazzed about it and he 's penned a polemic on why bands should n't ever go country '' .
he takes iceage and fellow recent country converts , such as christopher owens , to task .
here 's a juicy segment : copenhagen 's iceage , meanwhile , started off as teenage hardcore punks and as recently as 2013 were imitating the glacial motions of classic joy division .
but on their latest album , plowing into the field of love , they clatter along like a truckful of pitchfork-wielding rednecks chasing the local hippies out of town .

the concept of danish country-punk could have been interesting , but perhaps out of a misguided desire for earthiness and substance , iceage have merely trundled down a well-trodden road to nowhere . ''
ouch .
it 's not all bad though , forever is one of my favourite tracks of the year .
anyway , enough of the conjecture you can stream it for yourself below .

documents.title: `` we 're not giving feet to the geometric shapes , '' the tetris movie is coming to a cinema near you
text: a scene from the new tetris movie ( not really ) .
tetris think of a video game that would be completely unsuitable for transition to the big screen .
a video game devoid of a plot , characters or - in any meaningful sense of the word - levels .
have you got it .
yes , that 's it friend : tetris .
the same guys who brought mortal kombat to the cinemas are trying to do the same with tetris .
how and indeed why they 're doing it is n't clear but they did talk to the wsj about why blocks could mean , er , big bucks .
threshold entertainment has teamed up with the tetris company to develop a live-action film based on the game .
while no directors or cast are attached to the film yet , there is a story in place .
it 's a very big , epic sci-fi movie , '' threshold 's ceo larry kasanoff tells speakeasy exclusively .
this is n't a movie with a bunch of lines running around the page .
we 're not giving feet to the geometric shapes . ''
we 'll rest easy then .
the demonic unbelievably straight-faced horror horn looks pretty ridiculous .
daniel radcliffe running about the place trying to convince people he is n't a demon , while horns sprout out of his bonce just does n't seem to add up .
it 's butting heads ( or should that be horns ) with kevin smith 's tusk which is equally daft - a misery meets the skin i live in body horror/black comedy - and stars justin long .
they 're both out towards the end of the month , so choose your bit of ivory and be damned .
ilana glazer and abbi jacobson have launched a new web series offshoot of their web series turned telly hit , broad city .
it 's called hack into broad city and sees the pair 'goof ' around while smoking weed .
in the latest episode ilana pretends to give birth to a lubed up frida kahlo doll .
morning all !
cloud nothings are great .
their album , here and nowhere else , which came out in march , is still dominating my most played list in itunes .

this is what we ( i ) wrote about it at the time : here and nowhere else is brazenly one-paced : it 's three-minute , heads-down , melodic garage rock all the way , until the penultimate song , pattern walks , breaks the mould by clocking in at a marathon seven-and-a-half minutes .

still , a lack of diversity does n't mean the album is inherently flawed - like fc barcelona refusing to revert to a plan b even when tiki-taka goes awry , there 's a charm to baldi 's steadfast faith in garage-rock brevity .

tracks such as just fear and now hear in manage to cram in more emotion , spit and anguish than most bands manage in twice the time , and the songwriting ( understandably , for a record written on the road ) feels urgent and to the point .
it 's brash , ballsy and , above all , fun . ''
now they 've gone an released a la jetee meets frank sidebottom video for stand out now hear in .
enjoy !
